day name: Veneration of the Precious Chains of the Holy and Illustrious Apostle Peter
name: Peter
troparia: (Tone 4) You came to us without leaving Rome by the precious chains which you wore.* First-enthroned of the Apostles* we bow down to them in faith and pray:** by your prayers to God grant us great mercy.
kontakia: (Tone 2) Let us praise the chief and the first among the apostles,* the godly disciple of the Truth - the great Peter.* And let us kiss his chains in faith,* obtaining the remission of sins.
